about_the_game:
Your father descended into the catacombs to kill Death and claim eternal life.
He failed, and cut you out of his will, leaving everything to his cat.
Your revenge? Succeeding where he failed.

EXPLORE

Delve into Death’s domain and become strong enough to defeat him. But be cautious: the maze shifts every time, and the Reaper's scythe is never far behind you. Keep your lantern bright and full of oil to fend off the darkness.

CATCH, THROW, AND BASH

You start every run as the fragile and fearful young poet, Samuel Durant. His cane can reflect projectiles, but it’s barely strong enough to squash a spider. Luckily, he has a talent for catching, and by grabbing items, he can either use them or throw them at his foes.

BUILD YOUR SKILLS

By collecting and assembling your prayer beads, you get stronger, more agile, and more resilient. Powerful relics synergize and transform your strategy. But the most important ability will always be your skill as a player.

SLAY YOUR PREDECESSORS

You aren’t the only seeker who has ventured into Death’s domain. Powerful Severed Souls who craved eternal life also dwell in the depths, becoming twisted by their desire. The regions they inhabit have warped to the shape of their hearts, and you’ll have to watch out for unique traps and enemies that share their realms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: A sidescrolling roguelike game where you catch, throw, and parry your way through Death's Domain to kill the Grim Reaper and claim eternal life, all to spite your rich father who cut you out of the will.
